text: ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا قَدَّمَتْ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَيْسَ بِظَلَّـٰمٍ لِّلْعَبِيدِ

translation.en.sahih: That is for what your hands have put forth [of evil] and because Allah is not ever unjust to His servants."
translation.id.indonesian: Demikian itu disebabkan oleh perbuatan tanganmu sendiri. Sesungguhnya Allah sekali-kali tidak menganiaya hamba-Nya,
